system.description:
Your war dance isn’t just beautiful, it’s deadly, and you have honed this weapon to a razor edge.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain an additional adept dance Focus Feature, or a Focus Feature that requires dances.
  • You may add 1/2 your bard level to your adept level for the purpose of the extra attack feature, as well as qualifying for the Additional Attack Focus Feature.
    While in your war dance, your unarmed strikes and adept weapon attacks deal additional damage equal to your charisma modifier.  
  • When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points while in your War Dance, you may use your reaction to regain a use of bardic inspiration.  Once you have done so, you may not do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
